channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: 1 warning was fixed in trunk by HADOOP-8818. I'll pull this to branch-2, 2.8, and 2.7.
Backported HADOOP-8818 to branch-2, 2.8, and 2.7. Now there are 4 findbugs warnings.
Also, 1 warning was fixed in trunk by HADOOP-9121. I'll pull this as well.
Backported HADOOP-9121 to branch-2, 2.8, and 2.7. Now there are 3 warnings.

-1 overall

1. checkstyle warnings are method len; spurious.
  2. why two nested try-with-resources, instead of one with multiple stream openings in the try() clause?

why two nested try-with-resources, instead of one with multiple stream openings in the try() clause?

Nice catch. Simply I forgot to merge two try-with-resources.
